refnamediv.refpurpose: checksum and count the blocks in a file

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Print checksum and block counts for each FILE.

listitem.para: use BSD sum algorithm, use 1K blocks
use System V sum algorithm, use 512 bytes blocks
With no FILE, or when FILE is -, read standard input.
GNU coreutils online help: <http://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/> Report sum translation bugs to <http://translationproject.org/team/>

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: Written by Kayvan Aghaiepour and David MacKenzie.

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: The full documentation for sum is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and sum programs are properly installed at your site, the command
should give you access to the complete manual.
